idna.description: An issue was found in the idna library that allows an attacker to trigger a heap-buffer overflow vulnerability by passing a crafted argument to the idna.encode() function. This flaw could lead to a denial-of-service (DoS) attack.
idna.name: CVE-2024-3651

recommendation.text: Upgrade to version 3.7 or later of the idna library, as it includes a fix for this vulnerability.

idna.title: CVE-2024-3651 - idna
